subtitle: An easy and economical all-in-one meal.

method.text: Place the pasta in a pan of boiling water. Bring to the boil. Simmer for 8-10 min or according to pack instructions. Drain well.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large saucepan. Add the onion. Fry for 2 min until softened. Add the sausages and bacon. Fry for 5 min until well browned.
Add the tomatoes, beans, Worcestershire sauce and seasoning. Simmer gently for 10 min, stirring frequently.
Stir the pasta into the hotpot mixture. Simmer for 5 min. Serve.

title: Spicy sausage, bacon and bean hotpot
